mapper.select: SELECT * FROM room WHERE roomno NOT IN(SELECT distinct ro.roomno FROM reserve re RIGHT JOIN room ro ON re.roomno = ro.roomno WHERE (TO_DATE(#{start}, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN re.startday AND re.endday) AND (TO_DATE(#{end}, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN re.startday AND re.endday)) and rcity = #{city} and rpeople >= #{people}
select * from room order by roomNo desc
